author: Kieran Lewis
comment: *using Moto G2 with LG Urbane* the watch face looks great, and ambient mode is fantastic with the simple look, however there a few issues with the face. The unread message count is just staying on constantly after message has gone, and even after restarting the watch, and in ambient mode the now cards block the bottom of the screen which let to me turning off the now card preview. If these issue were fixed, the face would easily be 5*
title: Great looking but with a few issues

author: Ryan Joseph
comment: This is a great looking face, but the say peek cards show in ambient mode isn't good. The background of the card is full black, covering everything. It makes the watch look like it has a huge flat tire, or like something's wrong. It doesn't look good at all. Ideally, I'd like to see the card background be semi transparent so the watch face still shows through. But even fully transparent would look better than what it is now.
title: Almost perfect, ambient cards need work

author: Web DesignInc
comment: Got this beautiful watchface but uninstalling because no option to to either manually enter weather location or to turn off weather widget.  Please create this option as having GPS running on my phone as it drains the batery. If the weather widget can be turned off or switched off or to another widget function I would buy almost all the Rich watch faces.
title: Option to turn off weather?

author: Jeff McMenomey
comment: Was using futuristic for last few months but I like this one even more. I had a hard time seeing the battery levels with futuristic but the gauges on this one are easy. I really like the look of it. Two issues, temperature is unreadable font AND missed call icon doesn't clear after clearing on phone.
title: Fix it and it is my daily watch face

author: Matthew Dial
comment: Would be five stars if not for a bug where the SMS indicator keeps showing 1 unread message. Lost another two stars for not updating since 2015 and the SMS indicator bug has been mentioned by other users for over a year.
title: Minor bug

author: Oliver Serek
comment: Probably my favorite watch face right now,  but indeed hindered by the fact that it 'sometimes' shows still having messages when I have none. Please fix?
title: Just shy of great...

author: JD Purvis
comment: LOVE this face, one of my favorites.  Unfortunately I have the same issue as others with the unread messages (none are archived).     Update:  no stuck unread messages latley.
title: Beautiful!  But...

author: Arek Stopczynski
comment: Would be perfect if there was an option for only seconds hand to animate upon wake up. With full ambient mode enabled, all the other animations look superficial.

author: Haydn King
comment: This is one of the best faces I've used. Clean, functional and an attractive ambient face. More please, would like to see different styles on the same detailed design. Different hands option would be good.
title: The Best

author: Daniel Flores
comment: Is there any possibility to have more ambient mode options. For example, use less pixels and remove white filling on the watch hands in ambient mode.
title: Ambient mode not very oled friendly

author: Adrinata Kusuma
comment: Although I've had issues with phone battery staying at 100%, but it is fixed by reloading the watchface. Don't know why.
title: Good

author: Drew Henseleit
comment: Moto 360 says I have 6 unread messages when I have none.  Kind of useless feature unless its fixed.

author: Paul Locke
comment: Getting the missed call icon up and it won't go away.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Paul,

please check archived messages if you have them.

Regards

title: Missed call alert

author: ME Mine
comment: This is the analog face I have been looking for all this time! The only thing missing is the ability to disable cards in ambient mode and it would be 5 stars all the way!!!
title: The perfect analog watch face

author: Bill Smith
comment: Like others have said, sometimes the notifications/badges don't disappear. Works great otherwise.
title: Looks great, has stuck notifications

author: Dmitry Glozman
comment: Temperature in Fahrenheit is not displayed properly. First digit is cut off .Would like to see more customisation.

author: Andrei Robu
comment: In ambient mode - notifications aren't transparent. So they cover/block the lower part of the watch face! You should fix this!

author: Eitan Netzer
comment: Does not sync properly. Msg indicator has nothing to do with reality

author: James Cridland
comment: It would be really good if the full ambient actually was full ambient, not a cut-down, black and white version of ambient. Ideally it should look identical to the active watch (but with no seconds).
title: Nice looking, not full ambient

author: Peter Tosi
comment: I've had my Android watch 24 hours and I've already realised your watch faces are consistently high quality with great features. I have a bunch of them on my watch. Keep up the good work 😊

author: Dave McFall
comment: Love this face but the phone battery level never moves it always stays at 40% fix it and it's 5 star
title: Beautiful but

author: Jonathan Gramling
comment: High resolution, looks great on the Huawei Watch. Love that the hands move when you wake the watch to the proper position. Keep up the great work!
title: Beautiful face

author: Moth Croker
comment: Looks great on my G Watch R. Is there any chance of an option to prevent the hands animating from 00:00 to the current time when awakening from Ambient mode?

author: Jonathan Snipes
comment: Well this is a good face but cant get those notifications to dissapear ie the phone notification and messages notification, dont tryed everything

author: Blake Williams
comment: Either make the weather work properly or give me a way to hide the weather from the watch face and it will be better.
title: It's good looking but the weather doesn't work

author: Joe Lewis
comment: Its great i love it but one problem i don't want the screen to time out its the only downside.

author: stephen zone
comment: Can't sync faces to my watch
title: Doesn't work

author: bluray1080jp
comment: Makes my rose gold Urbane look so sophisticated. The only watch face i use now.
title: LG Watch Urbane soul mate

author: Ashraf Nour
comment: Not open. I re installed but same.  Can you advise how it will be send and show on my watch.  Gear s2

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

our watch faces are only for Android Wear watches.
You can see it in description. Your watch isn't Android Wear, it's on Tizen OS.

Regards

title: Not open with me.There always error. Payed money for nothing

author: Crestard Falohun
comment: Watch dead in a few hours, didn't make it to 2pm after off charger at 7am
title: Battery Hog

author: David Taroyan
comment: Great face but can you make it so we can not show the weather?
title: Awesome

author: Shane Green
comment: Won't show up on my gear s2! Paid for it, downloaded it and nothing.

author: Liam Phelps
comment: Very cool. But I always have 4 unread messages?

author: Turgut Kalfaoglu
comment: nice but it doesn't install on casio esd f10

author: Bernie B.
comment: Very Elegant
title: They're just as the name states

author: Tony C
comment: Lovely design
title: My fav face yet

author: Soumyadeep Acharya
comment: Awesome Watch Face!!

author: Derrick Mullins
comment: Ok
title: Nice

author: Sorin Lavric
comment: Would be great if you can remove  and change color/position battery meter ;)
title: More options

author: Joseph carroll
comment: Great looking watch face but says I have a missed text even after reading text on phone

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Joseph,
Please check it in the archive
